original_title: Cartoon Craze Presents: Popeye: Little Swee' Pea
overview: A collection of Popeye film Shorts featuring: 1. Greek Mirthology 2. A Date To Skate 3. Bride And Groom 4. Floor Flusher 5. Fright To The Finish 6. Little Swee' Pea 7. Ancient History 8. Out To Punch 9. Spooky Swabs 10. Assault And Flattery
